name: ScheduleSitePagePublication
description:
Schedule a site page for publication at a specified time.

Use this tool to set a future publication date for a site page within the HubSpot CMS. It can be used to automate the release time of new content on your website.

parameters.name: publication_date
parameters.description: The date and time when the site page should be published. Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2023-12-31T23:59:00Z').

value_schema.description: The date the object should transition from scheduled to published.

parameters.name: object_id_to_schedule
parameters.description: The ID of the site page to be scheduled for publication.

value_schema.description: The ID of the object to be scheduled.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: publishDate
parameters.description: The date the object should transition from scheduled to published.

value_schema.description: The date the object should transition from scheduled to published.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the object to be scheduled.

value_schema.description: The ID of the object to be scheduled.
